page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: The children from the Carse,Merkinch and South Kessock go to Merkinch School.At interval in their playground they play chasing games like Hop It or Tig.In Spring they play with marbles. After school they often watch T.V., especially Dungeons and Dragons,an adventure cartoon.Their outdoor sports are football,golf,walking and swimming at the Inverness Baths. They know a lot about Pop music.Shakin Stevens is their favourite.They support Inverness Caledonian F.C. and boys often go to games with their dads. Boys and girls help at home by hoovering and shopping.They wash dishes.Some can cook or bake or even do the ironing. About a quarter have a computer or play electronic games.The Community Centre is popular in the evenings.
